summary:
VAT overview - The Value Added Tax (VAT) is a consumption tax applied in the European Union (EU) to all goods and services.

 Estimate in USD - This amount is an estimate based on the most recent currency conversion rate.

 Buyer Protection Program - When you buy a domain name at Dan.com, you’re automatically covered by our Buyer Protection Program.

 Fast & easy transfers - 98% of all domain ownership transfers are completed within 24 hours.

 Hassle free payments - We partner with Adyen to safely handle payments.

 How does your domain ownership transfer process work? - No matter what kind of domain you want to buy, lease or rent, we make the transfer simple and safe.

 Which payment options do you accept? - We support the following payment options: Bank wire, Visa, MasterCard, iDeal, ApplePay, GooglePay, MisterCash, Sofort, Paypal, AliPay, WeChatPay, and Bitcoin.

 Do I have to pay for your services? - No, our Domain Ownership Transfer service is free of charge for domain buyers.
